description.lang: The SK-3007-05 curtain motor external module support connect specify motor to Z-Wave system reply. It support control motor open/close/stop and position, meanwhile it can feedback motor position as soon as it stopped.

deviceDescription.productName: Curtain Motor Control with external module

description.lang: Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, is assigned to send motor lifeline status to associated devices, including send the multilevel report frame while window cover position, send device local reset frame while set factory default manually etc.
Support Get only, feedback motor current position(0x00-0x63, 0xFE).
Support Set only. Toggle motor direction between reverse and default as send out set command with any value(0x00-0xFF).

name.lang: Clear motor lead tail endpoint setting

description.lang: Support Set only.Clear motor lead tail endpoint setting as send out set command with any value(0x00-0xFF).
Clear motor lead tail endpoint setting
Support Set only. Enable manual pull function as send out set command with any value(0x00-0xFF).
Support Set only. Disable manual pull function as send out set command with any value(0x00-0xFF).
